column4: What is the fastest way of configuring wpa wireless with command line?
wicd-curses
thanks
it also has a desktop x based app. wicd rocks!
boot flag is meaningless to grub
do I need a partition for grub?
it can go on the ubuntu partition
dpkg -l | grep -i fgrlx
shows nothing.. I assume no drivers are installed
do you know how to install 11.6 fglrx?
check /var/log/Xorg.0.log
http://hastebin.com/vujowelelo
check what: fglrx(0): firegl_SetSuspendResumeState FAILED -9      is
the order (top to bottom) is significant
you can add the name servers to /etc/resolvconf/resolv.conf.d/head   and they will be added when the server boots
they wil get added to /etc/resolv.conf then used :)
that file says the same thing
that's the file to add to. or you can add it in /etc/network/interfaces if you used that file to define address/subnet etc
I'm using dhcp
http://askubuntu.com/questions/157154/how-do-i-add-changes-resolv-conf-without-getting-overwritten
yes, the dhcp servers for nameservers will flod in and be put in, the head servers are added first, then the dhcp ones, then the tail ones (as I understand it)
